{"id":487312854,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1619851816,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/487312854/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string w1, string w2) {\n        int m=w1.size();\n        int n=w2.size();\n        if(m==0 && n==0) return 0;\n        int dp[m+1][n+1];\n        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));\n        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){\n            dp[0][i]=i;\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<=m;i++){\n            dp[i][0]=i;\n        }\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++){\n                if(w1[i]==w2[j]){\n                    dp[i][j]=min(dp[i-1][j]+1,dp[i][j-1]+1);\n                    dp[i][j]=min(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j-1]);\n                }\n                else{\n                    dp[i][j]=min(dp[i-1][j]+1,dp[i][j-1]+1);\n                    dp[i][j]=min(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j-1]+1);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n]+1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
